page.title: 10Games Children Play
page.content: Tag This is a game for two or more players.One player is the catcher.He has to run and touch another person. That person then becomes the catcher and so on. Stick in the Mud This game is for five or more players. There are two catchers.Everyone else runs and the catchers chase them.When they are touched they must stand still with their legs apart until someone crawls under them.Then they can run again. Bucket Ball Two teams are needed for Bucket Ball. One person in each team holds a bucket.The other team members have to throw a ball into the bucket to score. The team with the most balls in their bucket wins.
